title: The One With The Race Car Bed

questions.question: What does Ross say nobody is allowed to climb on at work?
questions.explanation: Ross tells a story about what happened at work, mentioning a dinosaur.

questions.question: What is Rachel's initial impression of Ross when she imagines him as Alan Alda?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I love how he cares so much about stuff. If I squint I can pretend heâ€™s Alan Alda.'

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero that Chandler would like to be?
options: The Man Who Can Fly and Be Invisible
questions.correct_answer: The Man Who Can Fly and Be Invisible
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'If I was a superhero who could fly and be invisible, that would be the best.'

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when Joey announces he has a new gig?
questions.explanation: The gang cheers and congratulates Joey when he announces his new gig.

questions.question: What is the name of the character Joey is auditioning for in the soap opera?
questions.explanation: Joey mentions that he has an audition for the role of Nick the boxer in the soap opera 'All My Children'.

questions.question: Why does Ross agree to go to dinner with Rachel's father?
options: Because he wants to impress Rachel's father
Because he wants to prove a point
questions.explanation: Rachel asks Ross to come to dinner with her father, and Ross agrees for her sake.

questions.question: What is Dr. Green's nickname for Ross?
questions.explanation: Dr. Green refers to Ross as 'wethead' during their dinner conversation.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's allergy to lobster?
options: He had a bad experience with lobster
questions.explanation: Rachel mentions that Ross is allergic to lobster, implying a shellfish allergy.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she tries to hide the race car bed from Monica?
options: She tries to disguise it as a normal bed
She tries to return it to the store
She tries to convince Monica that she wanted a race car bed
She makes a sound like a car accelerating
questions.correct_answer: She makes a sound like a car accelerating
questions.explanation: Phoebe tries to distract Monica by making a sound like a car accelerating when she sees the bed.

questions.question: Why does Joey advise his student to play the role of Nick the boxer 'supergay'?
options: Because he thinks it's a good acting choice
Because he wants to sabotage his student's audition
Because he wants to help his student get the part
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants to sabotage his student's audition
questions.explanation: Joey advises his student to play the role 'supergay' because he wants the part for himself and wants to sabotage his student's audition.

questions.question: What is the name of the doctor that Rachel sees for her alignment issues?
questions.explanation: Rachel mentions that she sees Dr. Bobby for her alignment issues, and that his first name is also Bobby.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's distress when she sees the race car bed in her bedroom?
options: She didn't order a race car bed
She doesn't like the color of the bed
She thinks it's too big for her room
She thinks it's too small for her room
questions.correct_answer: She didn't order a race car bed
questions.explanation: Monica is upset because she didn't order a race car bed and Phoebe signed for it pretending to be her.

questions.question: What is the reaction of Joey's students when he tells them about his experience with the audition for Nick the boxer?
options: They give him a round of applause
questions.correct_answer: They give him a round of applause
questions.explanation: Joey's students applaud him after he shares his story about the audition for Nick the boxer.

questions.question: What is the name of the soap opera that Joey is teaching his students about?
questions.explanation: Joey mentions that he has an audition for a role in the soap opera 'All My Children'.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's surprise when he sees the race car bed in Monica's bedroom?
options: He didn't know Monica had a new bed
He didn't know Monica liked race cars
He thought Monica had better taste
He thought the bed was a joke
questions.correct_answer: He didn't know Monica had a new bed
questions.explanation: Chandler is surprised to see the race car bed in Monica's bedroom because he didn't know she had a new bed.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he sees the bill for dinner with Dr. Green?
options: He pays the bill in full
He tries to sneak out without paying
questions.explanation: Ross adds a $20 tip to the bill when Dr. Green isn't looking.

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant where Ross and Rachel have dinner with Dr. Green?
questions.explanation: The scene takes place in a restaurant, but the name of the restaurant is not specified.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's apology to Joey after their boxing match?
options: She didn't hit him hard enough
She forgot to wear her boxing gloves
She didn't want to play anymore
questions.explanation: Phoebe apologizes to Joey after their boxing match because she hit him too hard and made his nose bleed.

questions.question: What is the reaction of Dr. Green when he finds out that Ross added a large tip to the bill?
questions.explanation: Dr. Green is angry when he finds out that Ross added a large tip to the bill, thinking that Ross is trying to show off.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's distress when Chandler sees the race car bed in her bedroom?
questions.explanation: Monica is embarrassed when Chandler sees the race car bed in her bedroom because she didn't order it and is trying to hide it.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he finds out that his student got the role of Nick the boxer?
options: He tries to sabotage his student's role
questions.explanation: Joey is disappointed when he finds out that his student got the role of Nick the boxer, because he wanted the role for himself.

options: Dr. Green is mean to him
Dr. Green is dismissive of him
Dr. Green is trying to impress him
questions.correct_answer: Dr. Green is dismissive of him
questions.explanation: Ross is frustrated with Dr. Green because Dr. Green is dismissive of him and doesn't take him seriously.
